descriptions.400: Your request was written in Daedric script and cannot be read.
descriptions.401: You need the proper credentials to enter this House stronghold.
descriptions.402: The guild requires payment before granting access to this knowledge.
descriptions.403: This area is restricted. Only those with proper authority may pass.
descriptions.404: The path you seek does not appear on any map of Vvardenfell.
descriptions.405: That approach will not work in Morrowind. Try another method.
descriptions.406: The format you request is unknown to the scholars of Vivec.
descriptions.408: Your summon spell has expired. The connection timed out.
descriptions.409: There is a dispute between the Great Houses over this resource.
descriptions.410: This location has been consumed by the Blight and no longer exists.
descriptions.413: Your inventory is full. Drop some items before proceeding.
descriptions.429: You are making too many requests. Rest and regain your fatigue.
descriptions.500: A great disturbance has occurred in the Ghostfence. The servers are unstable.
descriptions.502: The gateway to Tel Fyr is not responding.
descriptions.503: The Tribunal Temple is closed for meditation. Try again later.
descriptions.504: The silt strider took too long to arrive. The connection has timed out.
descriptions.default: You have wandered into unfamiliar territory.

footers.400: Journal Entry: I spoke gibberish and the guard looked at me suspiciously. I should try again with clearer words.
footers.401: Journal Entry: The door is locked. I need to find a key or convince someone to let me in.
footers.402: Journal Entry: The merchant demands gold. I cannot proceed without payment.
footers.403: Journal Entry: I was turned away at the entrance. This place is forbidden to outsiders.
footers.404: Journal Entry: I searched the streets of Balmora, but the location remains elusive. Perhaps I should ask the locals.
footers.405: Journal Entry: My approach failed. I need to find another way.
footers.406: Journal Entry: They do not understand what I'm asking for. Perhaps it doesn't exist in this form.
footers.408: Journal Entry: I waited too long and lost my chance. The connection has faded.
footers.409: Journal Entry: Two factions are fighting over this resource. I'm caught in the middle.
footers.410: Journal Entry: This place is gone, consumed by ash and blight. Nothing remains.
footers.413: Journal Entry: I cannot carry any more. My burden is too heavy.
footers.429: Journal Entry: I've been traveling too quickly. I need to rest and recover my strength.
footers.500: Journal Entry: Something terrible has happened. The very fabric of Vvardenfell seems unstable.
footers.502: Journal Entry: The gateway does not respond. Perhaps it has been destroyed.
footers.503: Journal Entry: The Temple is closed. I must return later when they are receiving visitors.
footers.504: Journal Entry: The silt strider never arrived. I've been waiting too long.
footers.default: Journal Entry: I have encountered an unexpected obstacle on my journey.
